statement.title: Statement
statement.description: A statement is a document that describes a policy or proposal. It is the root of the comment graph. Each statement object is a single revision of a statement.

authors.description: Parties involved in the creation of the statement.

title.description: The full (human readable) title of the statement.

label.title: Label
label.description: A label is a unique identifier, it is used as part of a URI to retrieve a piece of content.

version.title: Version
version.description: A semantic version for this revision of a piece of content. See http://semver.org/ for a full specification.

details.description: Extra details about this version, for example release notes, or sign-off.

date.description: The date and time when this version was officially released.

author.title: Author
author.description: An entity who has contributed to a piece of content.

id.description: A unique identifier of a person or entity.

credit.description: A description of the work contributed by this party.

relation.description: A short background about how the author relates to the proposal (ex: level of expertise or practical experience with the topic).

section.description: A section within a document, may have a header, and can be referenced my feedback.
